article_text:
March 23, 2015

White House Daily Briefing Josh Earnest briefed reporters and responded to questions on a variety of topics, including include the Iran nuclear negotiations, violence… read more

og.description: Spokesman Josh Earnest briefs reporters and answers their questions on a variety of issues.
